scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some well-deserved time off. A colleague messages you privately about an urgent task.
scenes.description: ‘Hey, I’m really sorry to bother you during your leave, but we have an urgent task that needs immediate attention. Can you help?’

options.text: I'm currently on leave, but let me see if I can quickly assist you.
options.analysis: You acknowledged your leave but showed willingness to help, demonstrating good empathy and perception, though your self-regulation could be stronger.

options.text: I'm really sorry, but I need to respect my time off. Can you find someone else?
options.analysis: You prioritized your time off, showing strong self-regulation, but your empathy and motivation to help were lower.

options.text: I can help for a short while, but I can't commit fully. Let's try to solve it quickly.
options.analysis: You offered partial help, showing balanced empathy and social skills, but your motivation and self-regulation were not particularly high.
